price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Ihanganire rero ishikirizabutumwa ku bw’Imana Allah, maze wihanganire n’ibangamira ry’abaguhakana; mu vy’ukuri wewe, Tugushinze ijisho nta kigukorako urakingiwe, uheze uninahaze n’Imana yawe Rurema Allah mu kuyishimagiza mu gihe ugiye gusenga no mu gihe uvyutse;
arabic: وَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعۡيُنِنَاۖ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ

meta.transliteration: wa-iṣ'bir liḥuk'mi rabbika fa-innaka bi-aʿyuninā wasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika ḥīna taqūmu
